医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为什么为幼儿寻找新冠疫苗仍然如此困难？ 9 月 12 日，疾病控制与预防中心建议 6 个月及以上的所有人进行下一轮新冠疫苗注射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f85203-33d6-4e18-b4d3-05c7ef6a8d7a Fri, 20 Oct 2023 14:30:00 -0400 Why is finding covid shots for young children still so hard?
让我们诚实地讨论一下随着年龄的增长会发生什么我们中有多少人想要一本可靠的、基于证据的衰老指南，来解释随着年龄的增长，我们的身体和思想如何变化，以及如何适应这些差异？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0671f33-cb01-42a6-ad09-449c9e72ce87 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:48:37 -0400 Let’s have an honest conversation about what to expect as you age

定期体育活动对老年人心血管状况的有益影响定期体力活动（PA）对老年运动员微循环功能和血浆抗氧化能力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/The-beneficial-effects-of-regular-physical-activity-on-the-cardiosculpture-profile-in-the-elderly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/The-beneficial-effects-of-regular-physical-activity-on-the-cardioangio-profile-in-the-elderly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cca967b-0cb8-4d83-9537-eaa91e661f1d Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:54:00 -0400 The beneficial effects of regular physical activity on the cardiovascular profile in the elderly
新研究将产前化学物质暴露与儿童肥胖轨迹联系起来产前接触内分泌干扰化学物质与儿童体重指数生长模式之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-study-links-prenatal-chemical-exposure-to-childhood-obesity-trajectories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-study-links-prenatal-chemical-exposure-to-childhood-obesity-trajectories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c2e0c73-e670-434d-88cd-bb4cbdef0ece Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:27:00 -0400 New study links prenatal chemical exposure to childhood obesity trajectories
世界卫生峰会领导人警告说，世界仍未完全免受另一场大流行的影响在世界卫生峰会 (WHS) 上，全球领导人警告说，世界仍未完全免受像 COVID-19 这样的另一场流行病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/World-still-not-complete-protected-from-another-pandemic-WHS-leaders-warn.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/World-still-not-complete-protected-from-another-pandemic-WHS-leaders-warn.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=435ba6d2-333d-4447-ae22-7d0c77861f31 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:19:00 -0400 World still not fully protected from another pandemic, WHS leaders warn
分析发现 1800 万英国成年人面临患糖尿病的风险伦敦医学实验室的最新分析显示，多达 1800 万英国成年人可能患有糖尿病前期，这意味着他们正处于患上 2 型糖尿病的边缘。这比通常引用的 700 万数字要高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/18-million-British-adults-at-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes-analysis-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/18-million-British-adults-at-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes-analysis-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1fdeb6c-ab53-49b3-babf-05c7daccec74 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:16:00 -0400 18 million British adults at risk of developing diabetes, analysis finds
开创性的合作伙伴关系支持针对抗菌药物耐药性的早期创新，以拯救生命Innovate UK、LifeArc 和 Medicines Discovery Catapult (MDC) 联手创建了 PACE（抗菌素临床功效途径），这是一项耗资 3000 万英镑的计划，支持针对抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 的早期创新，以拯救生命。 PACE 今天（2023 年 10 月 19 日）宣布首次募集资金，提供高达 1000 万英镑的资金支持创新者开发新型抗菌药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pioneering-partnership-supports-early-stage-innovation-against-antimicrobial-resistance-to-save-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pioneering-partnership-supports-early-stage-innovation-against-antimicrobial-resistance-to-save-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=370d3682-a969-4152-a065-f3e43b4111d2 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:13:00 -0400 Pioneering partnership supports early-stage innovation against antimicrobial resistance to save lives
